com.ebay.lightning.core.services

Interface TaskExecutionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskExecutionServiceImpl

    public interface TaskExecutionService
    The TaskExecutionService interface defines the operations for processing the request and getting the response.
    Author:
    shashukla
    See Also:
    TaskExecutionServiceImpl, TaskExecutionManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<LightningRequestReport> getAuditReports(java.lang.String sessionId)
      Get the detailed execution reports.
      SystemStatus getLightningStats()
      Get the system metrics including CPU, physical and JVM memory.

      Get the detailed execution report for the request.

      Get the system configuration including capacity, retention policy etc

      Check for bandwidth to make reservation for the specified load.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        void submit(LightningRequest request)
        Submit a request to get executed asynchronously at high speed. The request should contain the ReservationReceipt returned by the reserve(int) call.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the list of Task and configuration to execute

      • pollResponse

        LightningResponse pollResponse(java.lang.String sessionId,
                               boolean pollDeltaOnly)
        Poll the current execution state for the request submitted by #submit(LightningRequest) method. This method id helpful to check if the request has completed.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the LightningRequest
        pollDeltaOnly - get full if true and delta response if false
        Returns:
        LightningResponse that has the current state of task execution

      • getReport

        LightningRequestReport getReport(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Get the detailed execution report for the request. This method is usually called after checking if the request is completed by calling pollResponse(String, boolean)
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the LightningRequest
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report of the request

      • reserve

        ReservationReceipt reserve(int load)
        Check for bandwidth to make reservation for the specified load.
        Parameters:
        load - the load to check for reservation
        Returns:
        the reservation receipt containing either of the state ACCEPTED, DENIED, BUSY

      • getAuditReports

        java.util.List<LightningRequestReport> getAuditReports(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Get the detailed execution reports.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        Returns:
        the list of LightningRequestReport available in the store

      • getLightningStats

        SystemStatus getLightningStats()
        Get the system metrics including CPU, physical and JVM memory.
        Returns:
        the current system status

      • updateSystemConfig

        SystemConfig updateSystemConfig(SystemConfig sysConfig)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Update the system configuration including capacity, retention policy etc
        Parameters:
        sysConfig - the system configuration changes to make
        Returns:
        the system configuration after update
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the update fails

      • getSystemConfig

        SystemConfig getSystemConfig()
        Get the system configuration including capacity, retention policy etc
        Returns:
        the current system configuration
